comments.en:
Large format (A3/11x17) colour laser printer

PostScript version of the AcuLaser C2000

Epson provides a free (LGPL) driver for this printer. With this the printer should work to its full extent.

A scanning add-on for this printer is available, so that one can make an multi-function device (printing, scanning, copying) out of it.

Consumables/Refills:
